properties.sfomuseum:creditline: Gift of David A. Abercrombie in memory of Stanley A. Abercrombie
properties.sfomuseum:description: Menu issued by American Airlines, part of the "The Beauty of Flight" series, Singapore - Auckland route; silver cover with color illustration of a bird (White-winged dove); dinner menu items include stuffed pork chop, Chateaubriand, or crab legs; handwritten note indicates use on San Francisco - Washington Dulles route; menu number: F-181-T-3; class: business; date: 6/79.
